# Changelog

## [1.0.0] - 2025-11-17

### Added
- TeleBot Wizard kutubxonasining ilk versiyasi
- BotWizard klassi va barcha asosiy funksiyalar
- Multi-menu qo'llab-quvvatlash
- Reply va Run rejimlari
- CLI tool
- Bot connection test qilish
- Konfiguratsiya eksport qilish
- Validation tizimi
- Professional exception handling
- To'liq test coverage
- Comprehensive documentation
- PyPI package struktura
- Development tools (black, flake8, mypy)

### Features
- Zero-Code bot yaratish
- Multi-menu tizimi
- Dual mode buttons (reply/run)
- Auto keyboard generation
- Error handling va validation
- CLI interface
- Configuration export
- Connection testing
- Comprehensive documentation

### Security
- Input validation
- Safe code execution
- Token format validation
- Error sanitization

### Documentation
- Detailed README
- Code documentation
- Usage examples
- Installation guide
- Development guide

### Testing
- Unit tests
- Integration tests
- CLI tests
- Test coverage reports

### Development
- Modern Python packaging
- Development dependencies
- Quality tools (black, flake8, mypy)
- CI/CD ready structure
